name: Shotgun of Souls
description:
Story

Join Koto on her quest against the Demon Lord! She wields a ghostly-powered shotgun. This supernatural weapon  can absorb souls as ammo and fire vicious ghosts that haunt their targets! Can you survive all the waves until the final showdown?

A top-down shooter made for Mini Jam 117.

How to Play

Movement: WASD / Arrows

Shoot: Mouse left

Reload: Mouse right / R

Dash: Mouse center / Space / E

Next message in conversations: all previous keys
